79229.<pipipi_high>\n「『砂塵にうごめく大巨人』ですね。\n とある勇敢:
This is the "Great Dust Giant". A brave warrior, who was frightened to death before he disappeared, told this story. I saw it. I saw
a huge, mountainous figure staring out from behind the dust cloud... How big?

79230.<pipipi_high>\n「『プクランドの首長竜』ですね。\n これは プク:
This is The"Pukuland Lake Monster". This is a rumor that anglers in Pukuland saw something strange in the lake. While they were
fishing, a huge shadow with a long neck appeared on the surface of the lake in the distance!

79231.<pipipi_high>\n「『エルトナの生き人形』ですね。\n これはエルト:
This is the "Eltona Living Doll". This is a rumor that is rapidly spreading among the children of Eltona Continent. According to
stories, people have seen the dolls moving around in the woods... It's thrilling to see them move.

79232.<pipipi_high>\n「『深き森の幽霊列車』ですね。\n これは とある:
This is the "Ghost Train in the Forest". This is a rumor of a ghost train that runs on an abandoned line left deep in a certain forest.
The ghost train is said to be running on an abandoned train line deep in the woods! The moment he prepared to die, the train slipped
through his body and passed by him....ah~ that's scary!

79233.<pipipi_high>\n「…………っといった 感じらしいわ。\n<bw_b:
<pipipi_high>
I heard that they are like, "Oh, yeah.
<bw_break>

79234.<pipipi_high>\n「『海上に浮かぶ夢幻郷』ですね。\n 突然 海の上:
This is the "Dream City on the Sea". It is rumored to be an out-of-this-world city that suddenly appears and disappears over the sea.
It is said that if you approach it by boat, it disappears like a mist. It's really eerie, myself, and I can't stop thinking it's
ominous...

79235.<pipipi_high>\n「『ドワチャッカの謎の飛行物体』ですね。 \n ド:
This is the "Dwachakka Mystery UFO". It is a rumor that a mysterious luminous object appears in the sky in Dwachakka where
you can see the beautiful stars. According to eyewitnesses, it was moving erratically, which is impossible for a shooting star. I'm
getting nervous.

79236.<pipipi_high>\n「『吹雪にほほえむ雪女』ですね。 \n 吹雪の晩に:
This is the "Snow Woman Spirit". On the night of a blizzard, a beautiful woman appears and whoever sees her gets iced to death...that's
the rumor. This is serious business, even taking pictures. A life-threatening mission... This is the true taste of wonder research!
